title: British rapper Stormzy gets political at BRIT Awards
text:
British rapper Stormzy gets political at BRIT Awards Thursday, February 22, 2018 - 00:45 
UK rapper Stormzy closed the BRIT Awards with a politically-charged freestyle asking Prime Minister Theresa May ''where's the money for Grenfell?''. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
UK rapper Stormzy closed the BRIT Awards with a politically-charged freestyle asking Prime Minister Theresa May "where's the money for Grenfell?". Rough cut (no reporter narration).
